import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./appointment.css';// Link to your CSS file
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GetAppointments=()=>{const[appointments,setAppointments]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchAppointments=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('http://localhost:8080/api/getallappointments');console.log(response.data);// Add a "status" property to each appointment
const appointmentsWithStatus=response.data.allappointments.map(appointment=>({...appointment,status:'Pending'}));setAppointments(appointmentsWithStatus);}catch(err){console.error('Error fetching appointments:',err);setError('Failed to load appointments');}};fetchAppointments();},[]);// Handler to toggle the status between "Pending" and "Confirm"
const toggleStatus=id=>{setAppointments(prevAppointments=>prevAppointments.map(appointment=>appointment._id===id?{...appointment,status:appointment.status==='Pending'?'Confirm':'Pending'}:appointment));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Appointments"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error}),appointments.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No appointments available"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Appointment ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Appointment Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Appointment Time"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Comments"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:appointments.map(appointment=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{style:{color:'whitesmoke'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:appointment._id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:appointment.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:appointment.email}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:new Date(appointment.appointmentDate).toLocaleDateString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:appointment.appointmentTime}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:appointment.comments}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{onClick:()=>toggleStatus(appointment._id),style:{cursor:'pointer',color:appointment.status==='Pending'?'orange':'green'},children:appointment.status})]},appointment._id))})]})]});};export default GetAppointments;
